description: An error in Quantum (specifically the network being unknown to Quantum, called from get_instance_nw_info), will raise all the way to the compute manager, preventing the delete. If the instance is in error state, say for some networking issue, it can not be deleted.
title: error in Quantum prevents instance delete

comments.content: An error in Quantum (specifically the network being unknown to Quantum, called from get_instance_nw_info), will raise all the way to the compute manager, preventing the delete. If the instance is in error state, say for some networking issue, it can not be deleted.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aaron-lee

comments.content: This has been fixed with the move to Quantum API v1.1 and the new error codes.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aaron-lee
